text: Allahane kabagrhala, je adara-sanmanapurna ghara ahe, lokankarita kayama rahanyace karana banavile ani adaraniya mahin'yala ani haramamadhye kurbani dilya janarya janavarannahi ani tya janavarannahi, jyancya galyata patte asatila, he asasathi ki tumhi ya gostivara visvasa rakhava ki nihsansaya allaha akasancya va jaminicya samasta cija-vastunce jnana rakhato ani nihsansaya allaha pratyeka gostice cangalya prakare jnana rakhato
